title: Al, P-co-doping and interface engineering synergistically boost the electrocatalytic performance of WS2/Ni3S2/NiS nanosheet heterostructure for efficient hydrogen evolution reaction
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32251-32261
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05868B, Paper

Mghaib Al Shahrani, Mabrook S. Amer, Ahmad A. Alsaleh, Prabhakarn Arunachalam, Abdullah M. Al-Mayouf
By one-pot hydrothermal reaction, Al/P codoped NiS/Ni3S2/WS2 heterostructures were synthesized over nickel foam for electrocatalytic hydrogen evolution.
